name: Borg Queen
description: The deadly 'queen bee' of the Borg Collective and one of humanity's greatest nightmares. Her background is unknown, but her goal is clear: the complete assimilation of all organic life.

borgqueen_attack.name: Assimilation Strike
borgqueen_attack.description: Deal 100% Tech Damage and 25% Chance +1 Assimilation.

borgqueen_attack.name: Assimilation Strike
borgqueen_attack.description: Deal 125% Tech Damage and 50% Chance +1 Assimilation.

borgqueen_skill1.name: I am the Borg
borgqueen_skill1.description: Attack Up and Minor Tech Up to all allies for 3 turns. 25% Chance -1 Morale to enemies with Assimilation.

casterEffect.effect: Enemies Distribute Morale Down if Assimilated (25% Chance)

borgqueen_skill1.name: I am the Borg
borgqueen_skill1.description: Attack Up and Tech Up to all allies for 3 turns. 50% Chance -1 Morale to enemies with Assimilation.

casterEffect.effect: Enemies Distribute Morale Down if Assimilated (50% Chance)

borgqueen_skill2.name: Command
borgqueen_skill2.description: Taunt. Minor Regenerating Shield on self for 3 turns.

borgqueen_skill2.name: Command
borgqueen_skill2.description: Taunt. Regenerating Shield on self for 3 turns.

borgqueen_skill3.name: Assimilation Wave
borgqueen_skill3.description: 6 x 50% Tech Damage and 25% Chance +1 Assimilation to random enemies.

borgqueen_skill3.name: Assimilation Wave
borgqueen_skill3.description: 6 x 75% Tech Damage and 50% Chance +1 Assimilation to random enemies.

name: Michael Burnham
description: The adopted human sister of Spock, Burnham serves aboard the U.S.S. Discovery. Fiercely intelligent, driven, with a moral drive that occasionally brings her into conflict with her superior officers.

burnham_skill2.name: Stand Down
burnham_skill2.description: -2 Morale and Attack Down for 3 turns.

burnham_skill1.name: Phaser Burst
burnham_skill1.description: 9 x 30% Damage and Defense Down for 3 turns.

burnham_skill1.name: Phaser Burst
burnham_skill1.description: 9 x 45% Damage and Major Defense Down for 3 turns.

name: Beverly Crusher
description: A selfless doctor whose past accomplishments include serving as Head of Starfleet Medical. A consummate team player always willing to put the needs of her colleagues first.

crusher_skill2.name: Medical Tricorder
crusher_skill2.description: Scan and Defense Down for 3 turns.

crusher_skill2.name: Medical Tricorder
crusher_skill2.description: Scan and Major Defense Down for 3 turns.

crusher_skill3.name: Sterilization Field
crusher_skill3.description: Red Alert and Shield to all allies for 3 turns. Cleanse and 50% Chance +1 Morale to all allies

crusher_skill3.name: Sterilization Field
crusher_skill3.description: Red Alert and Major Shield to all allies for 3 turns. Cleanse and +1 Morale to all allies

name: Hugh Culber
description: Medical officer aboard the U.S.S. Discovery. A kind-hearted man who always fights for his patients and is willing to stand up to authority on their behalf.

culber_skill1.name: PADD Scan
culber_skill1.description: Heal and Minor Tech Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

culber_skill1.name: PADD Scan
culber_skill1.description: Major Heal and Tech Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

culber_skill2.name: PADD Inoculation
culber_skill2.description: Shield and Crit Chance Up to 1 ally for 3 turns. +1 Morale.

culber_skill2.name: PADD Inoculation
culber_skill2.description: Major Shield and Major Crit Chance Up to 1 ally for 3 turns. +2 Morale.

name: Data
description: Commander Data is the first android ever to serve in Starfleet. Despite his super-human strength, agility and intelligence, he pursues an endless quest to become more human.

data_skill1.name: Android Backhand
data_skill1.description: Deal 150% Damage (225% Damage to Cover) and 25% Chance to Stun for 3 turns.

data_skill1.name: Android Backhand
data_skill1.description: Deal 200% Damage (300% Damage to Cover) and 50% Chance to Stun for 3 turns.

data_skill2.name: Logical Paradox
data_skill2.description: Minor Attack Down for 3 turns and 50% Chance -1 Morale to all enemies.

data_skill2.name: Logical Paradox
data_skill2.description: Attack Down for 3 turns and -1 Morale to all enemies.

data_skill3.name: Tricorder Disable
data_skill3.description: Scan and 50% Chance to Purge to all enemies.

data_skill3.name: Tricorder Disable
data_skill3.description: Scan and Purge to all enemies.

name: The Doctor
description: The Doctor is an Emergency Medical Hologram (EMH) Mark I, a walking, talking comependium of medical expertise. The Doctor continues to learn and evolve as he serves aboard the U.S.S. Voyager.

doctor_attack.name: Medical Scan
doctor_attack.description: Minor Heal and Minor Defense Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

doctor_skill1.name: Photonic Shielding
doctor_skill1.description: Defense Up and +50% Resistance vs Stun to 1 ally for 3 turns.

doctor_skill1.name: Photonic Shielding
doctor_skill1.description: Major Defense Up and Immunity vs Stun to 1 ally for 3 turns.

doctor_skill2.name: Genetic Recombination
doctor_skill2.description: Major Heal and Cleanse to 1 ally.

doctor_skill3.name: Emergency Command Hologram
doctor_skill3.description: Deal 150% Tech Damage to all enemies. Red Alert to all allies for 3 turns.

doctor_skill3.name: Emergency Command Hologram
doctor_skill3.description: Deal 300% Tech Damage to all enemies. Red Alert to all allies for 3 turns.

name: Gul Dukat
description: Dukat is a 'gul', a high-ranking commander in the Cardassian armada. His practiced charm hides an insidious, power-hungry mind… one willing to sell out anyone or anything for power.

dukat_skill1.name: Ruthless Fire
dukat_skill1.description: Deal 150% Damage and 50% Chance -1 Morale.

dukat_skill1.name: Ruthless Fire
dukat_skill1.description: Deal 225% Damage and -1 Morale.

dukat_skill2.name: Coercion
dukat_skill2.description: Taunt and Minor Attack Down to all enemies for 3 turns.

dukat_skill2.name: Coercion
dukat_skill2.description: Taunt and Attack Down to all enemies for 3 turns.

dukat_skill3.name: Disruptor Barrage
dukat_skill3.description: Deal 8 x 25% Damage to random enemies. 25% Chance -1 Morale.

dukat_skill3.name: Disruptor Barrage
dukat_skill3.description: Deal 8 x 40% Damage to random enemies. 50% Chance -1 Morale.

name: Borg Maintenance Drone
description: The Borg equivalent of a worker-bee. Quiet, efficient and usually focused on repairing any damage nearby. Most ignore intruders as they're seen as too irrelevant to bother with.

genBorgEng_attack.name: Servo-Armature Strike
genBorgEng_attack.description: Deal 100% Damage and 10% Chance +1 Assimilation.

genBorgEng_attack.name: Servo-Armature Strike
genBorgEng_attack.description: Deal 125% Damage and 25% Chance +1 Assimilation.

genBorgEng_skill1.name: Shield Smash
genBorgEng_skill1.description: Deal 150% Tech Damage and 50% Chance to Tech Down for 3 turns.

genBorgEng_skill1.name: Shield Smash
genBorgEng_skill1.description: Deal 250% Tech Damage and Tech Down for 3 turns.

genBorgEng_skill2.name: Sensory Node Adjustments
genBorgEng_skill2.description: Minor Shield for 3 turns and 50% Chance to Cleanse to all allies.

genBorgEng_skill2.name: Sensory Node Adjustments
genBorgEng_skill2.description: Shield for 3 turns and Cleanse to all allies.

name: Borg Medical Drone
description: While the Borg don't have doctors, they do have drones built specifically to repair disabled units and keep the Collective active. Somewhere between butchers and mechanics.

genBorgMed_attack.name: Servo-Dermal Regenerator
genBorgMed_attack.description: Deal 100% Damage and 10% Chance +1 Assimilation.

genBorgMed_attack.name: Servo-Dermal Regenerator
genBorgMed_attack.description: Deal 125% Damage and 25% Chance +1 Assimilation.

genBorgMed_skill1.name: Servo-Laser Scalpel
genBorgMed_skill1.description: Cleanse and Minor Heal to 1 ally.

genBorgMed_skill2.name: Servo-Microsuture
genBorgMed_skill2.description: Minor Attack Up and Minor Defense Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genBorgMed_skill2.name: Servo-Microsuture
genBorgMed_skill2.description: Attack Up and Defense Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

name: Borg Assimilation Drone
description: A form of Drone adapted to enhance their technical processing power. They take an active role when planets or ships are assimilated; helping harvest the captives.

genBorgSci_attack.name: Assimilation Tubules
genBorgSci_attack.description: Deal 100% Damage and 10% Chance +1 Assimilation.

genBorgSci_attack.name: Assimilation Tubules
genBorgSci_attack.description: Deal 125% Damage and 25% Chance +1 Assimilation.

genBorgSci_skill1.name: Infiltrate
genBorgSci_skill1.description: Deal 150% Tech Damage and +1 Assimilation (Ignores Cover).

genBorgSci_skill1.name: Infiltrate
genBorgSci_skill1.description: Deal 250% Tech Damage and +1 Assimilation (Ignores Cover).

genBorgSci_skill2.name: Collective Attack
genBorgSci_skill2.description: Command 1 ally to Attack. Minor Attack Up (Minor Tech Up if ally is Borg) for that ally for 3 turns.

genBorgSci_skill2.name: Collective Attack
genBorgSci_skill2.description: Command 1 ally to Attack. Attack Up (Tech Up if ally is Borg) for that ally for 3 turns.

name: Borg Tactical Drone
description: A Borg Drone specifically designed for heavy combat. They're usually equipped with durable shields and a range of weapons appropriate to the encounter and environment.  A truly terrifying foe.

genBorgSec_attack.name: Servo-Armature Strike
genBorgSec_attack.description: Deal 100% Damage and 10% Chance +1 Assimilation.

genBorgSec_attack.name: Servo-Armature Strike
genBorgSec_attack.description: Deal 125% Damage and 25% Chance +1 Assimilation.

genBorgSec_skill1.name: Shield Smash
genBorgSec_skill1.description: Deal 150% Damage (225% Damage vs Shields)

genBorgSec_skill1.name: Shield Smash
genBorgSec_skill1.description: Deal 250% Damage (375% Damage vs Shields)

genBorgSec_skill2.name: Sensory Node Adjustments
genBorgSec_skill2.description: Taunt for 3 turns. 25% Chance to +1 Assimilation.

genBorgSec_skill2.name: Sensory Node Adjustments
genBorgSec_skill2.description: Taunt for 3 turns. 50% Chance to +1 Assimilation.

name: Cardassian Commander
description: The Cardassian Empire is famed throughout the Quadrant as a brutal place, one where absolute loyalty to the state is demanded and only the strongest are allowed to rise.  Such a person is the Cardassian Commander.

genCardCom_skill1.name: Cardassian Union
genCardCom_skill1.description: -1 Morale and Minor Attack Down to 1 enemy for 3 turns.

genCardCom_skill2.name: Battle Formation
genCardCom_skill2.description: Minor Attack Up and Minor Defense Up to all allies for 3 turns.

genCardCom_skill2.name: Battle Formation
genCardCom_skill2.description: Attack Up and Defense Up to all allies for 3 turns.

name: Cardassian Engineer
description: The Cardassian counterpart to Starfleet's engineering crews. The majority are female, as most males lack the technical acumen required to keep ships and equipment running smoothly.

genCardEng_skill1.name: Subspace Communications
genCardEng_skill1.description: Minor Attack Up and Minor Crit Chance Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genCardEng_skill1.name: Subspace Communications
genCardEng_skill1.description: Attack Up and Crit Chance Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genCardEng_skill2.name: Deflector Shields
genCardEng_skill2.description: Shield to 1 ally for 3 turns. (50% Chance for +1 Morale if ally is Cardassian).

genCardEng_skill2.name: Deflector Shields
genCardEng_skill2.description: Major Shield to 1 ally for 3 turns. (+1 Morale if ally is Cardassian).

name: Cardassian Medic
description: Cardassian doctors are just as ruthless as the rest of their military, eager to increase their knowledge at any cost. Rumors of torture and reprogramming are more than just Federation propaganda.

genCardMed_skill1.name: Dermal Regenerator
genCardMed_skill1.description: Minor Heal and Minor Defense Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genCardMed_skill1.name: Dermal Regenerator
genCardMed_skill1.description: Heal and Defense Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genCardMed_skill2.name: Cardassian Superiority
genCardMed_skill2.description: Attack Up to all allies for 3 turns. (50% Chance +1 Morale if ally is Cardassian)

genCardMed_skill2.name: Cardassian Superiority
genCardMed_skill2.description: Major Attack Up to all allies for 3 turns. (+1 Morale if ally is Cardassian)

name: Cardassian Scientist
description: A member of the Cardassian Science Ministry, an organization tasked with ensuring that any of the more dangerous military inventions are... palatable... to the general population.

genCardSci_skill1.name: Experimental Compound
genCardSci_skill1.description: Deal 100% Tech Damage to all enemies.

genCardSci_skill1.name: Experimental Compound
genCardSci_skill1.description: Deal 150% Tech Damage to all enemies.

genCardSci_skill2.name: Aphasia Device
genCardSci_skill2.description: Plant a Bomb on an enemy. If detonated, Deal 150% Damage and 10% Chance to Stun for 3 turns to all enemies.

genCardSci_skill2.name: Aphasia Device
genCardSci_skill2.description: Plant a Bomb on an enemy. If detonated, Deal 200% Damage and 25% Chance to Stun for 3 turns to all enemies.

name: Cardassian Security
description: The rank and file of the Cardassian war machine. Each is raised from the cradle to believe in the superiority of their Empire and their right to dominate the Alpha Quadrant.

genCardSec_skill1.name: Heavy Fire
genCardSec_skill1.description: Deal 5 x 30% Damage and 50% Chance +1 Morale on self if enemy is defeated.

effects.effect: Self Morale Up if Enemy Defeated (50% Chance)

genCardSec_skill1.name: Heavy Fire
genCardSec_skill1.description: Deal 5 x 50% Damage and +1 Morale on self if enemy is defeated.

effects.effect: Self Morale Up if Enemy Defeated

genCardSec_skill2.name: Willpower
genCardSec_skill2.description: Attack Up on self for 3 turns.

genCardSec_skill2.name: Willpower
genCardSec_skill2.description: Major Attack Up on self for 3 turns.

name: Starfleet Commander
description: To become the Commander of a Starfleet vessel is an honor, reserved for the brightest and best. Each is trained in tactics, negotiations, philosophy and all manner of studies that help promote the Federation philosophy as they expand throughout the Quadrant.

genHumanCom_skill1.name: Starfleet Maneuver
genHumanCom_skill1.description: Red Alert to all allies for 3 turns.

genHumanCom_skill1.name: Starfleet Maneuver
genHumanCom_skill1.description: Red Alert and Minor Tech Up to all allies for 3 turns.

genHumanCom_skill2.name: First Duty
genHumanCom_skill2.description: Minor Attack Up and 50% Chance +1 Morale to all allies for 3 turns.

genHumanCom_skill2.name: First Duty
genHumanCom_skill2.description: Attack Up and +1 Morale to all allies for 3 turns.

name: Starfleet Engineer
description: Starfleet engineers are trained to think on their feet, prepared for any eventuality, and able to adapt any technology, alien or otherwise, to meet the needs of their ship.

genHumanEng_skill1.name: Technological Adaptations
genHumanEng_skill1.description: Minor Tech Down to all enemies for 3 turns.

genHumanEng_skill1.name: Technological Adaptations
genHumanEng_skill1.description: Tech Down to all enemies for 3 turns. Minor Tech Up for 1 random ally for 3 turns.

genHumanEng_skill2.name: Replicate Cover
genHumanEng_skill2.description: Create Cover to 1 ally. (50% Chance for +1 Morale if ally is Starfleet)

genHumanEng_skill2.name: Replicate Cover
genHumanEng_skill2.description: Create Cover to 1 ally. (+1 Morale if ally is Starfleet)

name: Starfleet Medic
description: Starfleet's medical personnel provide essential support to every ship and colony to which they're assigned. All are extensively trained in xenobiology to serve the wide range of species that make up the Federation.

genHumanMed_skill1.name: Medical Tricorder
genHumanMed_skill1.description: Minor Heal and +25% Resistance vs Wound to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genHumanMed_skill1.name: Medical Tricorder
genHumanMed_skill1.description: Heal and +50% Resistance vs Wound to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genHumanMed_skill2.name: Dermal Regenerator
genHumanMed_skill2.description: 50% Chance to Cleanse and Minor Regeneration to all allies for 1 turn.

genHumanMed_skill2.name: Dermal Regenerator
genHumanMed_skill2.description: Cleanse and Regeneration to all allies for 1 turn.

name: Starfleet Scientist
description: Starfleet scientists embody the core tenets of Starfleet's mission: curiosity, exploration, discovery, and the quest to increase knowledge of the universe beyond.

genHumanSci_skill1.name: Polaron Emitter
genHumanSci_skill1.description: Scan and 50% Chance to Purge to 2 random enemies.

genHumanSci_skill1.name: Polaron Emitter
genHumanSci_skill1.description: Scan and Purge to 2 random enemies.

genHumanSci_skill2.name: Ex Astris Scientia
genHumanSci_skill2.description: Minor Tech Up and Minor Defense Up to all allies for 3 turns.

genHumanSci_skill2.name: Ex Astris Scientia
genHumanSci_skill2.description: Tech Up and Defense Up to all allies for 3 turns.

name: Starfleet Security
description: The "red tunics" provide the backbone of all Starfleet expeditions. Dedicated and resourceful, rumors of their high mortality rate are (mostly) overstated.

genHumanSec_skill1.name: Improvised Cutting Beam
genHumanSec_skill1.description: Deal 5 x 30% Damage and 50% Chance Defense Down

effects.effect: 100% Damage (5 hits, Morale Up if cover breaks)

genHumanSec_skill1.name: Improvised Cutting Beam
genHumanSec_skill1.description: Deal 5 x 50% Damage and Defense Down.

effects.effect: 100% Damage (5 hits, Morale Up if cover breaks)

genHumanSec_skill2.name: Selfless Diversion
genHumanSec_skill2.description: Taunt for 3 turns. 25% Chance +1 Morale to a random ally.

genHumanSec_skill2.name: Selfless Diversion
genHumanSec_skill2.description: Taunt for 3 turns. 50% Chance +1 Morale to a random ally.

name: Klingon Commander
description: A leader used to a crew renowned throughout the quadrant as some of the finest warriors in existence.  Each flies into battle knowing that their ancestors are watching and determined to make them proud.

genKlingCom_skill1.name: Rally
genKlingCom_skill1.description: Minor Attack Up to all allies for 3 turns. 25% Chance +1 Morale if ally is Klingon.

genKlingCom_skill1.name: Rally
genKlingCom_skill1.description: Attack Up to all allies for 3 turns. 50% Chance +1 Morale if ally is Klingon.

genKlingCom_skill2.name: Intimidate
genKlingCom_skill2.description: Defense Down to 1 enemy for 3 turns.

genKlingCom_skill2.name: Intimidate
genKlingCom_skill2.description: Defense Down to 1 enemy for 3 turns. 50% Chance -1 Morale.

name: Klingon Engineer
description: If you need a ship repaired fast and with brutal efficiency, the Klingon Engineer is the crew member you need. If you're lucky they might throw in a few blood stained banners or smoldering vents for a bit of local 'flavor'.

genKlingEng_skill2.name: Enhancements
genKlingEng_skill2.description: Minor Shield and Minor Defense Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genKlingEng_skill2.name: Enhancements
genKlingEng_skill2.description: Shield and Defense Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genKlingEng_skill1.name: Weaken Cover
genKlingEng_skill1.description: Deal 150% Tech Damage and 50% Chance to Wound.

genKlingEng_skill1.name: Weaken Cover
genKlingEng_skill1.description: Deal 200% Tech Damage and Wound.

name: Klingon Medic
description: A medic although one who's a bit more... rudimentary than their Starfleet equivalents. Each was born into a culture where death in battle was considered an honor, after all...

genKlingMed_skill1.name: Battle Cry
genKlingMed_skill1.description: Minor Heal (Heal if target ally HP is below 50%)

effects.effect: Healing Extra if Ally has Low HP

genKlingMed_skill1.name: Battle Cry
genKlingMed_skill1.description: Heal (Major Heal if target ally HP is below 50%)

effects.effect: Healing Extra if Ally has Low HP (Major)

genKlingMed_skill2.name: Hypospray
genKlingMed_skill2.description: Cleanse and Minor Attack Up to 1 ally for 3 turns. (50% Chance +1 Morale if ally is Klingon).

genKlingMed_skill2.name: Hypospray
genKlingMed_skill2.description: Cleanse and Attack Up to 1 ally for 3 turns. (+1 Morale if ally is Klingon).

name: Klingon Scientist
description: While Klingons have a reputation for being warriors, they've been responsible for some of the greatest technological advances seen in the Quadrant. Such works are built by their scientists who are a welcome addition to any crew.

genKlingSci_skill1.name: Spill Blood
genKlingSci_skill1.description: Minor Attack Up (Attack Up if ally is Klingon) for 3 turns and 50% Chance +1 Morale to 1 ally.

genKlingSci_skill1.name: Spill Blood
genKlingSci_skill1.description: Attack Up (Major Attack Up if ally is Klingon) for 3 turns and +1 Morale to 1 ally.

genKlingSci_skill2.name: Experimental Setting
genKlingSci_skill2.description: Deal 150% Tech Damage and 50% Chance to Wound.

genKlingSci_skill2.name: Experimental Setting
genKlingSci_skill2.description: Deal 200% Tech Damage and Wound.

name: Klingon Security
description: What one would expect from a Klingon soldier.  Each is powerful, loyal and brave; devoted to the defense of their people.

genKlingSec_skill1.name: Cover Barrage
genKlingSec_skill1.description: Deal 5 x 30% Damage. 25% Chance -1 Morale (50% Chance -1 Morale if enemy is Wounded).

effects.effect: Morale Down (25% Chance) if Wounded (50% Chance)

genKlingSec_skill1.name: Cover Barrage
genKlingSec_skill1.description: Deal 5 x 50% Damage. 50% Chance -1 Morale (-1 Morale if enemy is Wounded).

effects.effect: Morale Down (50% Chance) if Wounded (100% Chance)

genKlingSec_skill2.name: Instigate
genKlingSec_skill2.description: Minor Attack Up and +1 Morale on self.

genKlingSec_skill2.name: Instigate
genKlingSec_skill2.description: Attack Up and +2 Morale on self.

name: Romulan Commander
description: A blade of the Empire, forged in its fires and finally given command of one of their Warbirds. All are skilled in battle but also in survival: each knows that at any moment they could be betrayed and lose their position of power.

genRomuCom_skill1.name: Rally
genRomuCom_skill1.description: Cloak and Crit Chance Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genRomuCom_skill2.name: Intimidate
genRomuCom_skill2.description: -1 Morale and Minor Defense Down to 1 enemy for 3 turns.

name: Romulan Engineer
description: Romulan engineers are not as safety-conscious as their Federation counterparts. Efficiency and lethality are their guiding principles, all in service to the greater Empire.

genRomuEng_skill1.name: Self-Repairing Shield
genRomuEng_skill1.description: Minor Regenerating Shield to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genRomuEng_skill1.name: Self-Repairing Shield
genRomuEng_skill1.description: Regenerating Shield to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genRomuEng_skill2.name: Plasma Torpedoes
genRomuEng_skill2.description: Deal 150% Tech Damage (Ignores Cover).

genRomuEng_skill2.name: Plasma Torpedoes
genRomuEng_skill2.description: Deal 250% Tech Damage (Ignores Cover).

name: Romulan Medic
description: Part of the Romulan medical corp. Each is extremely well trained but, unlike their Federation counterparts tend to specialize primarily on their own species.

genRomuMed_skill1.name: Hypospray
genRomuMed_skill1.description: Minor Heal and Minor Crit Chance Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genRomuMed_skill1.name: Hypospray
genRomuMed_skill1.description: Heal and Crit Chance Up to 1 ally for 3 turns.

genRomuMed_skill2.name: Neurozine Hypospray
genRomuMed_skill2.description: Purge, 50% Chance -1 Morale, and Minor Defense Down to 1 enemy for 3 turns.

genRomuMed_skill2.name: Neurozine Hypospray
genRomuMed_skill2.description: Purge, -1 Morale, and Defense Down to 1 enemy for 3 turns.

name: Romulan Scientist
description: Romulan scientists are all too willing to push the boundaries of scientific ethics. They've been responsible for some of the quadrants' greatest inventions... and some of its worse horrors.

genRomuSci_skill1.name: Cloaking Device
genRomuSci_skill1.description: Cloak and Minor Tech Up for 3 turns to 1 ally.

genRomuSci_skill1.name: Cloaking Device
genRomuSci_skill1.description: Cloak and Tech Up for 3 turns to 1 ally.

genRomuSci_skill2.name: Thalaron Bomb
genRomuSci_skill2.description: Plant a Bomb on an enemy. If detonated, Deal 150% Damage and 25% Chance -1 Morale all enemies.

effects.effect: Bomb (100% damage and Morale Down 25% Chance)

genRomuSci_skill2.name: Thalaron Bomb
genRomuSci_skill2.description: Plant a Bomb on an enemy. If detonated, Deal 200% Damage and 50% Chance -1 Morale all enemies.

effects.effect: Bomb (100% damage and Morale Down 50% Chance)

name: Romulan Security
description: Warriors charged with eliminating threats to the Romulan Empire. They are adept at physical confrontations but also are well versed at dealing with spies and other forms of subterfuge that dominate the empire's politics.

genRomuSec_skill1.name: Heavy Fire
genRomuSec_skill1.description: Deal 5 x 30% Damage and 50% Chance -1 Morale if Cloaked.

genRomuSec_skill1.name: Heavy Fire
genRomuSec_skill1.description: Deal 5 x 50% Damage and -1 Morale if Cloaked.

genRomuSec_skill2.name: Ready Weapon
genRomuSec_skill2.description: Crit Chance Up and Cloak on self for 3 turns.

genRomuSec_skill2.name: Ready Weapon
genRomuSec_skill2.description: Major Crit Chance Up and Cloak on self for 3 turns.

name: Geordi La Forge
description: Despite being born blind, Geordi has worked his way up from helmsman to Chief Engineer of the U.S.S. Enterprise. His VISOR allows him to "see" things beyond the limit of human sight.

geordi_attack.name: Cutting Beam
geordi_attack.description: Deal 100% Tech Damage and 10% Chance to Tech Down for 1 turn.

geordi_attack.name: Cutting Beam
geordi_attack.description: Deal 125% Tech Damage and 25% Chance to Tech Down for 1 turn.

geordi_skill1.name: Replicated Barrier
geordi_skill1.description: Create Cover and Minor Tech Up to 1 ally.

geordi_skill1.name: Replicated Barrier
geordi_skill1.description: Create Cover and Tech Up to 1 ally.

geordi_skill3.name: Enhanced Shield
geordi_skill3.description: Shield for 3 turns and 50% Chance +1 Morale for all allies.

geordi_skill3.name: Enhanced Shield
geordi_skill3.description: Major Shield for 3 turns and +1 Morale for all allies.

geordi_skill2.name: Disruption Pulse

name: Philippa Georgiou
description: The former leader of the Terran Empire, now a Section 31 operative. Cold and ruthless, she'll sacrifice millions for the sake of her ambitions. Her only weakness is her fondness for her adopted daughter, Michael Burnham.

georgiou_skill1.name: Imperial Presence

georgiou_skill2.name: Drone Barrage

georgiou_skill3.name: Stasis Strike

name: The Gorn
description: An alien species first encountered by Captain Kirk and the Enterprise. Their reptilian physiology grants incredible strength and endurance: the Gorn are widely considered one of the most physically powerful of the known races.

gorn_attack.name: Smash
gorn_attack.description: Deal 100% Damage (25% Chance to Wound).

gorn_attack.name: Smash
gorn_attack.description: Deal 150% Damage (50% Chance to Wound).

gorn_skill2.name: Boulder Toss

name: Captain Janeway
description: The famous captain of the U.S.S. Voyager. Her tenacity and brilliance helped save her ragtag crew as they ventured deeper into uncharted space than any previous Starfleet vessel.

name: Khan
description: A 20th century Augment dictator woken from cryosleep by the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise centuries later. Gifted by a eugenics program that made him smarter, faster and stronger than regular men... but far more arrogant.

khan_skill2.name: Ceti Eel

name: Captain Kirk
description: Captain James Tiberius Kirk is arguably the most legendary captain in Starfleet history. His quick thinking, boldness and charisma have saved the lives of his crew - and saved the Federation - countless times.

kirk_skill1.name: Invigorating Speech

name: Locutus of Borg
description: A nightmare created when Captain Picard was assimilated by the Borg. Possessing all of the Captain's tactical genius and knowledge of Starfleet protocols, Locutus retained only a shred of his humanity.

name: Martok
description: A famed Klingon who acted as the chief commander of their forces during the 24th century. Considered by military historians to be an excellent tactician with a rare ability to bond with his troops.

name: Leonard McCoy
description: Chief Medical Officer of the U.S.S. Enterprise under Captain Kirk. A gruff man famous for his sardonic sense of humour, his broad set of skills and, more than anything else, his inherent humanity.

name: Kira Nerys
description: A Bajoran ally of the Federation, working on the Deep Space Nine station after its liberation from Cardassian forces. A determined patriot devoted to her people, Kira never accepts defeat.

name: Seven of Nine
description: Assimilated by the Borg as a child, Seven is one of the few survivors of the Borg's brutality. Her remaining cybernatic enhancements make as lethal in combat as she is brilliant in strategy.

name: Odo
description: A mysterious shapeshifter rescued by Bajorans, Odo rose to become the security officer of the Deep Space Nine station. Gruff, solitary and possessed of a firm sense of justice.

name: Phlox
description: Arguably one of the greatest doctors in Starfleet history. Phlox is a Denobulan, an alien race eager to learn more about their new human neighbours. A xenobiologist without peer.

name: Captain Picard
description: Widely considered one of the greatest captains in Starfleet history. Renowned as a tactician, thinker and diplomat, Captain Picard strives to uphold the ideals of the Federation, no matter the challenges he faces.

name: Captain Pike
description: Former captain of the U.S.S. Enterprise. A kind, decent man doomed to suffer a terribly injury that leaves him voiceless and immobile.

name: Quark
description: A Ferengi trader, bartender and occasional criminal  (though he'd loudly protest that the latter were only a long series of 'misunderstandings' between himself and any number of local authorities). It's rumored he has a heart of latinum, but keeps it locked safely in a bank vault with the rest of his wealth.

name: William Riker
description: The quintessential First Officer: unquestionably loyal, unfailingly brave, and always willing to put his crew ahead of himself. A rare officer who was content to serve rather than seek command.

name: Saru
description: Saru is a Kelpian, an alien species born with a unique ability to sense danger. The first of his kind to join Starfleet, his dedication and skill led him to become First Officer on the U.S.S. Discovery.

name: Montgomery Scott
description: Chief Engineer of the U.S.S. Enterprise under Captain Kirk and famous for (in no particular order) his genius, his love of whiskey, and his proud Celtic heritage.

name: Sela
description: A half-Romulan, half-Human hybrid. She has little but scorn for mankind, preferring the cool, sharp intellect and fierce passions of her father's people. Treachery is her forte.

name: Captain Sisko
description: The Federation commander of station Deep Space Nine during the Dominion War. A proud leader and philosophical general, he is as comfortable ruminating on religion as he is creating revolutionary battle tactics.

name: Soji Asha
description: Growing up, Soji believed she was a normal woman, working as an anthropologist in Romulan space. This was a lie.  She was an android, built from the same systems that once created Data.  Her life so far has been a lie, created by others.  Her future, though, remains in her hands.

soji_skill1.name: Fighting Posture

name: Spock
description: Easily the most famed Vulcan in Starfleet history, Commander Spock is renowned for his logic, his thoughtfulness, and his firm friendship with Enterprise crewmates Captain Kirk and Dr. McCoy.

name: Hikaru Sulu
description: The fearless helmsman of the U.S.S. Enterprise, tasked with piloting her on her epic five year mission. As Spock once said, despite his calm demeanor Sulu is, at heart, a swashbuckler.

name: Sutra
description: An android, one of a series built using Soong technology. Sutra is hostile to humans, seeing them as little more than outsiders who wish to destroy her and her kind.  She seeks an alliance with a race of god-like synthetics who's whispers have been heard across the Quadrant.

name: Tomalak
description: A legendary Romulan commander, famed among his people for his cunning... and among his enemies for his treachery.

name: B'Elanna Torres
description: A half-Klingon, half-Human, former Maquis engineer. Pressed into service aboard the U.S.S. Voyager, she often struggles with her warring halves as she solves complex engineering problems with out-of-the-box solutions.

torres_attack.name: Phaser
torres_attack.description: Deal 100% Damage and 10% Chance to Defense Down for 1 turn.

torres_attack.name: Phaser
torres_attack.description: Deal 125% Damage and 25% Chance to Defense Down for 1 turn.

torres_skill2.name: Phaser Spread
torres_skill2.description: Deal 125% Tech Damage (Deal 200% Tech Damage to Cover) to all enemies.

torres_skill2.name: Phaser Spread
torres_skill2.description: Deal 200% Tech Damage (Deal 300% Tech Damage to Cover) to all enemies.

torres_skill1.name: Precision Strike
torres_skill1.description: Deal 300% Tech Damage and 50% Chance to Skill Lock for 3 turns.

torres_skill1.name: Precision Strike
torres_skill1.description: Deal 400% Tech Damage and Skill Lock for 3 turns.

name: T'Pol
description: A Vulcan officer assigned to the U.S.S. Enterprise NX-01 during the historic mission that introduced humankind to the stars. She is calm and thoughtful, with a core of steel that has served her shipmates well.

tpol_skill1.name: Suus Mahna
tpol_skill1.description: Deal 200% Damage and 25% Chance to Stun for 3 turns.

tpol_skill1.name: Suus Mahna
tpol_skill1.description: Deal 300% Damage and 50% Chance to Stun for 3 turns.

tpol_skill2.name: Discipline
tpol_skill2.description: Purge and Attack Down to all enemies for 3 turns. 50% Chance +1 Morale on self.

tpol_skill2.name: Discipline
tpol_skill2.description: Purge and Major Attack Down to all enemies for 3 turns. +1 Morale on self.

name: Nyota Uhura
description: Communications officer aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise under Captain Kirk. Her fluency in alien languages and calm under pressure make her an invaluable member of the crew.

uhura_skill2.name: Encourage
uhura_skill2.description: Minor Defense Up and +1 Morale to all allies.

uhura_skill2.name: Encourage
uhura_skill2.description: Major Defense Up and +1 Morale to all allies.

uhura_skill1.name: Universal Translator
uhura_skill1.description: Minor Tech Down and Minor Attack Down to all enemies for 3 turns.

uhura_skill1.name: Universal Translator
uhura_skill1.description: Tech Down and Attack Down to all enemies for 3 turns.

name: Worf
description: In another era, Worf would have been an enemy of the Starfleet. Instead, this proud Klingon rose to become one of its greatest officers: a warrior, a diplomat and an indispensable member of the Enterprise crew.

worf_attack.name: Bat'leth Strike
worf_attack.description: Deal 100% Damage (25% Chance to Wound).

worf_attack.name: Bat'leth Strike
worf_attack.description: Deal 125% Damage (50% Chance to Wound).

worf_skill1.name: Klingon Battle Cry
worf_skill1.description: Taunt for 3 turns. 50% Chance -1 Morale to all enemies.

worf_skill1.name: Klingon Battle Cry
worf_skill1.description: Taunt for 3 turns. -1 Morale to all enemies.

worf_skill3.name: Bat'leth Poise
worf_skill3.description: Counter and Attack Up on self for 3 turns.

worf_skill3.name: Bat'leth Poise
worf_skill3.description: Counter and Major Attack Up on self for 3 turns.

worf_skill2.name: Klingon Fury
worf_skill2.description: Deal 300% Damage (Deal 450% Damage if Wounded). +1 Morale if enemy is defeated.

effects.effect: Self Morale Up if Enemy Defeated

worf_skill2.name: Klingon Fury
worf_skill2.description: Deal 400% Damage (600% Damage if Wounded). +1 Morale if enemy is defeated.

effects.effect: Self Morale Up if Enemy Defeated
